verses.text: I am sought of \add them that\add* asked not \add for me;\add* I am found of \add them that\add* sought me not : I said , Behold me, behold me, unto a nation \add that\add* was not called by my name.
I have spread out my hands all the day unto a rebellious people , which walketh in a way \add that was\add* not good , after their own thoughts ;
A people that provoketh me to anger continually to my face ; that sacrificeth in gardens , and burneth incense upon altars of brick ;\f + \fr 65.3 \ft upon…: Heb. upon bricks\f*
Which remain among the graves , and lodge in the monuments , which eat swine’s flesh , and broth of abominable \add things is in\add* their vessels ;\f + \fr 65.4 \ft broth: or, pieces\f*
Which say , Stand by thyself, come not near to me; for I am holier than thou. These \add are\add* a smoke in my nose , a fire that burneth all the day.\f + \fr 65.5 \ft nose: or, anger\f*
Behold, \add it is\add* written before me: I will not keep silence , but will recompense , even recompense into their bosom ,

Your iniquities , and the iniquities of your fathers together , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which have burned incense upon the mountains , and blasphemed me upon the hills : therefore will I measure their former work into their bosom. \p

¶ Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, As the new wine is found in the cluster , and \add one\add* saith , Destroy it not; for a blessing \add is\add* in it: so will I do for my servants’ sakes, that I may not destroy them all.
And I will bring forth a seed out of Jacob , and out of Judah an inheritor of my mountains : and mine elect shall inherit it, and my servants shall dwell there.
And Sharon shall be a fold of flocks , and the valley of Achor a place for the herds to lie down in , for my people that have sought me. \p

¶ But ye \add are\add* they that forsake the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that forget my holy mountain , that prepare a table for that troop , and that furnish the drink offering unto that number.\f + \fr 65.11 \ft troop: or, Gad\f*\f + \fr 65.11 \ft number: or, Meni, a pagan god\f*

Therefore will I number you to the sword , and ye shall all bow down to the slaughter : because when I called , ye did not answer ; when I spake , ye did not hear ; but did evil before mine eyes , and did choose \add that\add* wherein I delighted not.

Therefore thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, Behold, my servants shall eat , but ye shall be hungry : behold, my servants shall drink , but ye shall be thirsty : behold, my servants shall rejoice , but ye shall be ashamed :
Behold, my servants shall sing for joy of heart , but ye shall cry for sorrow of heart , and shall howl for vexation of spirit.\f + \fr 65.14 \ft vexation: Heb. breaking\f*
And ye shall leave your name for a curse unto my chosen : for the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* shall slay thee, and call his servants by another name :

That he who blesseth himself in the earth shall bless himself in the God of truth ; and he that sweareth in the earth shall swear by the God of truth ; because the former troubles are forgotten , and because they are hid from mine eyes. \p
¶ For, behold, I create new heavens and a new earth : and the former shall not be remembered , nor come into mind.\f + \fr 65.17 \ft come…: Heb. come upon the heart\f*
But be ye glad and rejoice for ever \add in that\add* which I create : for, behold, I create Jerusalem a rejoicing , and her people a joy.
And I will rejoice in Jerusalem , and joy in my people : and the voice of weeping shall be no more heard in her, nor the voice of crying.

There shall be no more thence an infant of days , nor an old man that hath not filled his days : for the child shall die an hundred years old ; but the sinner \add being\add* an hundred years old shall be accursed.
And they shall build houses , and inhabit \add them;\add* and they shall plant vineyards , and eat the fruit of them.

They shall not build , and another inhabit ; they shall not plant , and another eat : for as the days of a tree \add are\add* the days of my people , and mine elect shall long enjoy the work of their hands.\f + \fr 65.22 \ft shall long…: Heb. shall make them continue long, or, shall wear out\f*
They shall not labour in vain , nor bring forth for trouble ; for they \add are\add* the seed of the blessed of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and their offspring with them.
And it shall come to pass, that before they call , I will answer ; and while they are yet speaking , I will hear.

The wolf and the lamb shall feed together , and the lion shall eat straw like the bullock : and dust \add shall be\add* the serpent’s meat. They shall not hurt nor destroy in all my holy mountain , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
